alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Henry; Rush; Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 9:43AM EDT until August 01 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 AM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SHELBY...RUSH...NORTHERN DECATUR AND HENRY COUNTIES... At 943 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near New Castle to 8 miles northwest of Lake Santee, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Shelbyville, New Castle, Greensburg, Rushville, Adams, Knightstown, St. Paul, Carthage, Spiceland, Kennard, Sulphur Springs, Lewisville, Mount Summit, Milroy, Glenwood, Straughn, Dunreith, Cadiz, Greensboro and Waldron. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 115 and 133. Interstate 74 between mile markers 116 and 131, between mile markers 134 and 136, and between mile markers 143 and 144. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
